thread.title: Central Arkansas considers adding women's beach volleyball
thread.title_full: Central Arkansas considers adding women's beach volleyball

title: Central Arkansas considers adding women's beach volleyball
text:
Central Arkansas considers adding women's beach volleyball University of Central Arkansas trustees are set to consider adding women's beach volleyball as a sport. Post to Facebook Central Arkansas considers adding women's beach volleyball University of Central Arkansas trustees are set to consider adding women's beach volleyball as a sport.  //on.kthv.com/1RwDTdY   Join the Conversation To   Central Arkansas considers adding women's beach volleyball Associated Press, news source 4:12 p.m. CDT October 8, 2015 Generic Image CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
CONWAY, Ark. (AP) - University of Central Arkansas trustees are set to consider adding women's beach volleyball as a sport. 
The Log Cabin Democrat ( http://bit.ly/1VHKQi7 ) reports the board of trustees will vote on whether to offer the sport beginning with the 2016-17 school year at a Friday morning meeting. 
The board's meeting agenda says the school's athletic department studied the feasibility of adding beach volleyball, and that it's among the fastest growing NCAA sports. 
Trustees would also consider a contract to build three beach volleyball courts for roughly $320,000. The courts would also be used for intramural sports. 
___ 
Information from: Log Cabin Democrat, http://www.thecabin.net
